gra 10/10

I love this game, but can't recommend it to new players in good faith.  Matchmaking is saturated with cheaters, and there's been no indication that Valve intends to introduce any kind of robust anti-cheat.  (VAC is a joke.)  There's also serious problems with the North American rank distribution (everyone - cheaters and smurfs included - are in Nova for whatever reason).  Yes, there's third party services like FACEIT and ESEA, but they're sweaty and therefore unfriendly to new players.  As it stands, Valve seems content to just squeeze as much money out of the skin market before even more of the player base moves on to games like Valorant.
Why does this game give me the worst RNG possible man :(
